article_title: Tens of thousands rally in Israel calling for hostage release deal
sentence: The  IDF  said  they  had  been  killed  shortly  before  its  troops  reached  them  on  Saturday.

article_title: Tens of thousands rally in Israel calling for hostage release deal
sentence: Among  those  present  at  the  protests  in  Tel  Aviv  was  24-year-old  Yotam  Peer,  whose  21-year-old  brother  was  killed  on  7  October  in  the  Hamas  attacks.

article_title: Tens of thousands rally in Israel calling for hostage release deal
sentence: The  Hostages  Families  Forum  said  that  the  six  captives,  whose  bodies  were  recovered  by  Israeli  military,  were  "murdered  in  the  last  few  days,  after  surviving  almost  11  months  of  abuse,  torture  and  starvation  in  Hamas  captivity".

article_title: Tens of thousands rally in Israel calling for hostage release deal
sentence: Hamas  kidnapped  251  people  and  killed  1,200  others  during  an  attack  in  southern  Israel  on  7  October  2023.

article_title: Tens of thousands rally in Israel calling for hostage release deal
sentence: More  than  40,530  people  have  been  killed  there  since  7  October,  according  to  the  territory's  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
